name: layer_one
description: Layer One API for use in GHL connections, hooks, and API calls for GHL APi V2

scripts.format: prisma format --schema src/prisma/postgres.prisma && prisma format --schema src/prisma/mongo.prisma
scripts.generate: prisma generate --schema src/prisma/postgres.prisma && prisma generate --schema src/prisma/mongo.prisma
scripts.dev-migrate:init: prisma migrate dev --name init --schema src/prisma/postgres.prisma && prisma db push --schema src/prisma/mongo.prisma
scripts.dev-migrate:optional: prisma migrate dev --schema src/prisma/postgres.prisma && prisma db push --schema src/prisma/mongo.prisma
scripts.deploy: yarn prisma:deploy && yarn build && node --loader ts-node/esm ./src/index.ts
scripts.prisma:deploy: prisma migrate deploy --schema src/prisma/postgres.prisma && prisma db push --schema src/prisma/mongo.prisma
scripts.migrate: prisma migrate deploy --schema src/prisma/postgres.prisma && prisma db push --schema src/prisma/mongo.prisma
